I think that the Shinsengumi characters of this work differ from 
Shinsengumi of RK considerably. 
However, they are very cool. 

http://ranobe.com/up/updata/up6349.jpg

Although this was the report of a Shonen Jump of Japan, I have not 
noticed this at all. 

At a Japanese site, there is almost no information about this.^^;;;
